size_t  add 
)

Allocates and converts the utf-16 string from utf-8 in8 utf-8 string to convert add any additional size which will be allocated for new utf-16 string in wchar_t (two bytes)

Returns:
New allocated and converted utf-16 string or NULL if in8 is 0.
